HEy DUde Ubehage Can u tell me ... does this Software allows me to run Windows Xp on my Vista Laptop...
If yes Please say it and .. i also have a problem that In my laptop there is 3GB Ram But Even a Small Game Runs very slow .. can u tell me what problem is occuring.
I have checked the properties it has 3002 MB of ram .......
 Please suggest me  specific solution .. thanks for this upload.
a milion thanx to the uploader!

THANK YOU!  for all your uploads.  I have installed VMware and Windows 7 and they work perfectly.  I even got my old 32bit Fujitsu COBOL running again and I am uploading the install ISO to a file sharing site now if anyone wants COBOL (Net Express COBOL is free but you have to have the expensive version of Visual Basic installed to run it).  I will post the link to the COBOL as soon as it uploads.

Thx.
I' been look'n for this Ass, since a Quart'a Past!
